text: @IngrahamAngle @BilldeBlasio Coronaviras racial inequality???  What a joke you are. How about coronavirus real estate taxes inequality. Or speed zone camera inequality? Or bridge toll inequality.  Btw, what kind of a salary will Mrs DeBlasio be earning. Talk about keeping $$ in the family.
